testcase.name: embed image
testcase.system-out:
* eval karate.embed('

Hello World

', 'text/html') .................. passed * def bytes = read('../upload/karate-logo.jpg') ........................... passed * eval karate.embed(bytes, 'image/jpeg') .................................. passed

testcase.name: embed pdf
testcase.system-out:
* eval karate.embed('

Hello World

', 'text/html') .................. passed * def bytes = read('../upload/karate-logo.jpg') ........................... passed * eval karate.embed(bytes, 'image/jpeg') .................................. passed * def bytes = read('../upload/test.pdf') .................................. passed * def embedder = read('embed-pdf.js') ..................................... passed * eval embedder(bytes) .................................................... passed
